ca.mcgill.ecse321.TreePLE.service

Class VersionManagerService

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.mcgill.ecse321.TreePLE.service.VersionManagerService

  • @Service
public class VersionManagerService
extends java.lang.Object
    This service class contains all main functionalities that have to do with changing the system's versions
    Author:
    Ilana Haddad

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      VersionManagerService(VersionManager vm)
      The VersionManagerService constructor sets the classe's vm to the system's vm.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<java.lang.String> getAllVersions()
      This method returns all versions of the system
      java.lang.String getCurrentVersionNumber()
      This method returns the version number associated to the TreeManager version selected
      int getCurrentVersionYear()
      This method returns the year associated to the TreeManager version selected
      java.util.List<TreeManager> getTreeManagers()
      This method returns all the TreeManagers of the system
      java.lang.String setSelectedVersion(java.lang.String versionSelected)
      This method changes the attribute isSelected of all TreeManagers in the system in order for only the version selected's TreeManager to have it as true, and all other ones as false.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

        vm -

    • Method Detail

      • setSelectedVersion

        public java.lang.String setSelectedVersion(java.lang.String versionSelected)
                                    throws InvalidInputException
        This method changes the attribute isSelected of all TreeManagers in the system in order for only the version selected's TreeManager to have it as true, and all other ones as false.
        Parameters:
        versionSelected - String with version number selected by user
        Returns:
        String of versionSelected as a success check that the update went through
        Throws:
        InvalidInputException - if no version of the system exists

      • getAllVersions

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getAllVersions()
        This method returns all versions of the system
        Returns:
        List of all version numbers associated to all TreeManagers of the system

      • getCurrentVersionYear

        public int getCurrentVersionYear()
        This method returns the year associated to the TreeManager version selected
        Returns:
        year of system

      • getCurrentVersionNumber

        public java.lang.String getCurrentVersionNumber()
        This method returns the version number associated to the TreeManager version selected
        Returns:
        version number

      • getTreeManagers

        public java.util.List<TreeManager> getTreeManagers()
        This method returns all the TreeManagers of the system
        Returns:
        List
